subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Prior to Friday’s game against the Yankees, Mets Manager Willie Randolph  did not deny that he had moved Carlos Beltrán to second in the batting order as some sort of energy infusion.
snippet: Prior to Friday’s game against the Yankees, Mets Manager Willie Randolph  did not deny that he had moved Carlos Beltrán to second in the batting order as some sort of energy infusion.
